verses.roman:
ācāryaratna-saṅge cale tāṅhāra gṛhiṇī
tāṅhāra premera kathā kahite nā jāni

synonyms: ācāryaratna-saṅge—with Candraśekhara; cale—goes; tāṅhāra—his; gṛhiṇī—wife; tāṅhāra—his; premera kathā—the description of the ecstatic love; kahite—to speak; nā jāni—I do not know how.
translation: The wife of Candraśekhara [Ācāryaratna] also went. I cannot speak of the greatness of Candraśekhara's love for the Lord.
